choices: Let the new chapter in the series begin......
1.content:
The tale began when Jak, 14 at the time, had a dream. His crush was a girl named Jasmine, who was 15 at the time. He dreamed that she was a 50 foot giantess. It all started when Jak's house was destroyed. Jasmine was being chased by Nostory. Nostory, who had claimed to be a Deamon, who are beings of darkness, who all have traits of beast, like claws or talons. He was trying to kill Jasmine. Jasmine didn't know why he was after her. Soon they met up with a new Deamon. The Deamon was a good one. His name was Shadow. Shadow ended up helping Jak and Jasmine get away from Nostory. Soon after, Shadow had tiped off to Jasmine that she had powers to grow herself. This only made Jasmine more curious of how she ended up as a 50 foot giant. She hoped that she would learn more during their journey. Soon when they were adventuring, they met up with a woman named Kate Berlin. Kate is a part of a group called L.O.R. which is called the League of Rebels. The organization is a group that is determined to get rid of the Deamon race. Kate explained that someone of L.O.R would be able to explain her powers. They met a man named Lucius, he was a old man who was a leader of one of many L.O.R. outposts. He was going to tell Heroes about the Prophecy. Then, Nostory attacked the compound. The book containing the Prophecy was lost. Our Heroes was able to win against Nostory and they locked him up. Soon after, Nostory escaped and kidnapped Kate and Shadow along with a new ally. The ally was Seth, another Deamon that was a 2nd hand man to Nostory. Jak and Jasmine set out to set out to save them. On their way, they stopped to the L.O.R. Outpost, and asked for directions to Nostory's Lair. Lucius had found the Prophecy. Here is the chapter for it.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------
"It is said," Lucius began to read the prophecy, "Than many centuries ago, when the Lord created Mankind, he also created two sentinel beings to live along side them. One race, the Angels, was an almost female race led by the Angel Goddess, Gabriel. The Angels were pure beings of light that bared wings on their backs and, somehow, processed the power to change size by will, but that ability is usually only limited to 10 feet tall. The only Angel whose power of growth is unlimited is Gabriel herself."

Lucius continued. "The Daemons were under the leadership of the Daemon God, Lucifer. All three races lived in harmony at first. But Lucifer was power-hungry and wanted to rule everything. Thus, came forth was the great war between Gabriel and her angels, who fought to defend the Humans, and the Daemons led by Lucifer. The war was long and bloody, as there were casualties on both sides. The Great War would have been decided by the battle between Gabriel and Lucifer. Gabriel herself fought gracefully and magnificence, but Lucifer was devious, dishonest and a damn-right cheats. He used his Daemon hoard to attack Gabriel on all sides while he attacked her in the confusion."

As her last resort, Gabriel had no choice, but to use all her power to create an alternate realm and send Lucifer and all the Daemons in there, separate from mankind forever. This however, cost Gabriel her life."

The great Lord created this Prophecy with his own will and gave the copies to the few High-Angels on this planet while he took the remaining angels to the cosmos with him. He also gave a warning that the Gods Gabriel and Lucifer will be reincarnated, and then the Great War will resume once again."

The two teens then put two and two together. First, he said that only the High-Angels on Earth had the only copies of the Prophecy, and the fact that Lucius has one. "Wait! You're a..." Jasmine started to say.

"I did say that Angels were an almost female race." Lucius stated out, then golden, birdlike wings appeared on his back. "I'm one of the few male Angels and also a High-Angel."

"That explains why you don't like Shadow that much," Jak said to Lucius. "Now, for the Reincarnation of Lucifer, I'd put all my money on that it's Nostory."

"But," Jasmine started to say, "If there's a reincarnation of Gabriel, and she has an unlimited growth rate, then that means..."

"Exactly," Lucius responded...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------
Jasmine is the reincarnation of Goddess Gabriel. And soon, they were on their way to Nostory's Lair. They saved Shadow and Kate and soon continued their journey. After many encounters, including a near-death battle with Nostory and Seth, the Heroes soon found out that Nostory was working on a portal to the real world. He told them that the world they were in now existed thousands of years ago. It became separated from reality. And Nostory would be betting to destroy the real world. Jak was captured by Seth, and the Heroes came to save him. Nostory made a deal with Kate to have a truce for a 1 year. Nostory wanted this, because he needed to enter the real world in a year. Soon, Jak and Jasmine entered the portal, and the dream Jasmine's memories went into the real Jasmine's memories. And Jasmine told Jak this. Soon they started dating.

Let's continue the epic story, shall we?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------
If you have no idea of what this chapter means, read the first adventure.

11.content:
Jak and Jasmine were sophomores in high school now. They were on the beach, enjoying the last day of earth in it's current state. It was Saturday, October 11th.

"So, what are we going to do?" Jasmine said.
"I think that we should go ahead and stick outside all day tomorrow." Jak said.
"That way, we will get a head start on where to meet Shadow and Kate."

11.title: The Day before the Worlds rejoin......

111.content:
"We should be able to defend ourselves now." Jak said. "I took that karate class."
"Yeah, we both did silly." Jasmine said. "You were one of my students."
"I had no idea you knew the art of karate." Jak said. "You were able to do many things."
"The teacher knows best." Jasmine said. "I was able to help get your blackbelt."
"But you're still better than me in karate." Jak said.
"But we can take care of ourselves." Jasmine said.
"We have to be on our guard this time." Jak said. "We can't let Nostory get an edge."
"That's right." Jasmine said. "Well have to be on the look out for the portals that get here. That way, we will have to find away to recongize curtain landmarks. And the good thing is we will have an direct point."

"I can't wait to see Shadow and Kate again." Jak said.
"Me too." Jasmine said. "I can't wait to have my growth powers again."
"Oh yeah, that's going to be good." Jak said.
"Me, a hot, giant, 16 year old girl...." Jasmine said, looking at Jak.
"Yeah....." Jak started to fantasize.
"Having my small wittle boyfriend in my hands." Jasmine said.
"That's the life...." Jak said.
"We should get home now." Jasmine said.
"Yeah." Jak said. "We should."
"I'll call you." Jasmine said. "See ya, Luigi-Boogums." She gave him a kiss.
"See ya later, Jas." Jak said. He earned this name since he liked Luigi from the Mario series.

They left the beach on this oddly, warm day in Chicago, Illinois. They took the train back to their houses, where they lived. They lived in the surburbs. Jak and Jasmine lived in the surburban city of Broadview.
111.title: It's the end of their world as they know it....

1111.content:
Jak woke up. He looked at his cell phone. It was about 9:00. Jak decided to get ready for today. He took a hot, warm, shower, which made him become wide awake. Soon, he went to eat cereal. He told his grandmother he was spending the weekend at a friend's place and that he would be back in a day or two. She allowed him to go, and told him to check in every now and then. He then traveled to a local superstore to meet his girlfriend. Jasmine noticed the look of concern on his face.

"What's wrong, Jak?" Jasmine said.
"I think this could be the last time we see our folks." Jak said.
"I thought about that too." Jasmine said. "When this crisis is over, we will see them again."
"Yeah. I packed some things, like clothes, tons of them, some food and snacks...." Jak said.
"I did pack stuff like that too." Jasmine said.
"Now, we just wait...." Jak said.

"Jak, I have a tangling feeling inside me...." Jasmine said.
"You do, huh?" Jak said, then he realized it. "Jasmine we should get out of here..."
"Why?" Jasmine said.

A earthquake like rumble occured. It was beginning. The worlds were starting to become one again. Jak and Jasmine went outside. They looked up in the sky. They saw a familiar looking ship in the air.

"Hey, Jas," Jak said. "That looks like the Deathray."
"I think it is Luigi-Boogums." Jamsine said.

Was it the Deathray?
1111.title: The Adventure Continues.....

11111.content:
"Jak...we need to go somewhere so people can't see me grow." She dropped her traveling bag.
"Ok." Jak said. He moved away from his girlfriend. She focused and tried to control her growth as her and Jak took her bags and ran behind the building of the store. She tried to go into a slight growth.

Jasmine started to grow. And she then she realized that her growth powers had returned to her. Jasmine smiled as she continued to grow. He, which was about 30 feet. Jak looked up at his Goddess Girlfriend. He was excited and worried about this whole adventure. Jasmine finally stopped at a height of about 10 feet now. Jasmine looked around for the Deathray, but there was no sign of it. However, Shadow and Kate stepped out from thin air.

"Shadow! Kate!" Jasmine said. "How did you-
"I see that you regained your growth powers." Shadow said. "And If you're asking, cloaking device on the Deathray. You think we want people to wonder what kind of aliens are here?"
"That's right. You have been taking care of yourself I can see." Kate said.
"Yep." Jasmine said. "It felt like I was going to grow higher, but I stopped myself."
"Let us help you get those bags into the ship." Shadow said, grabbing them.

Shadow then took their bags and uncloaked the opening hatch to the Deathray. They all got in, and the ship flew away, undetected. It looked to be a great reunion.

Or was it?

When Jak and Jasmine got inside the ship, they noticed that Shadow made some decorations to the ship, as if it were a party. There were ribbons everywhere, a banner that read: "Welcome Back, Jak and Jasmine!", and a cake.

"Wow, this is a surprise." Jasmine said, as she hugged Kate.
"Yeah. We couldn't wait to see you guys again." Kate said.
"What's been going on in the past year, guys?" Jak said.
"Well," Shadow started, "We will tell you guys after we celebrate."

The Heroes started to munch down on cake. It wasn't a traditional party, but wasn't like a group party. Shadow (With assitance of Kate...) had also brought some things, earth like things. There was a T.V, some food, like frozen pizza, canned corn, etc., supplies, like a microwave, a stove, a iron, etc. It turned out to be like a normal house- but in a ship. Jak and Shadow were playing a Playstation 3 that Kate brought.

"What's a video game?" Shadow asked.

"A game that involves interaction with a user interface to generate visual feedback on a video device." Jak said. "Like this thing here." Jak pointed to the PS3. "This is like the console. You use a game contoller to do curtain things in the game. Pressing bottons activate actions in game, and so on." Jak went on until Shadow understood.

"So, now can you tell us what happened to you guys during the year?" Jasmine said.

"Sure." Kate said. "Shadow became a solder of LOR......"

Shadow had indeed become a soldier of LOR. After Jak and Jasmine left, Kate signed a peace treaty with Nostory. She looked over it completely, looking for any typos or such. Turns out, it was fair. She signed the treaty. Then Shadow and Kate got into the Deathray and left.

Shadow decided to take Kate back to her LOR post. As Kate started to leave, she urged Shadow to come in. Lucius, who is one of the high angels, didn't attack him or anything. Shadow was welcomed into LOR. Shadow didn't say no to this offer. He became one of LOR's elite soldiers. Shadow and Kate were always called in to take on challenging missions.

With Shadow's help, LOR was able to make new weapons and supplies to aid them in battle. Shadow was happy. Kate and Shadow were rebuliding in many places, before Nostory and Seth just decided to destroy everything. The rebuliding process was a huge success.

Soon, they realized that it was time for them to start war again. And they saw as a huge, blue wave engulfed their world, and brought them into the real world, which brings us to now.
1111111.title: Flashback.

11111111.content:
While our heroes were celebraing their success, something sinister was arriving into their world. A portal opened and Nostory plus right hand man Seth stepped out of it. " We better shapeshift to avoid detection. " said Nostory. " Agreed, we'll stick out like a sore thumb if we remain in our daemon form." said Seth.

Nostory focused hard, his body was changing. His wings were absorbed by his body while his claws shrank into human hands. His robes became a black tuxedo while his mask disappeared, replaced by a human face. Despite this, he still had his sword, though he had turned it into a katana.

His face was that of a man in his 50's, with a mullet and dark blue eyes. " Not bad, though why did you choose to look like Geoffry Rush?" asked Seth. " Who?" asked Nostory, he had no idea who Geoffry Rush was. " Nevermind." said Seth.

Seth did the same, though he transformed into a more suitable person. He looked to be only 16 in his human form, he had blonde hair and blue eyes. " Good, now lets close the portal." said Nostory. " Why aren't we bringing in daemons to conquer this place?" asked Seth. " At this moment, the portal is too unstable for so many to pass through but we'll be working on that. " said Nostory, sounding like Geoffry Rush.

The gangster collapsed in a heap once Seth removed the blade. Nostory passed him the vial and he poured it on the it on the stab wound. The wound healed and the gangster got up, alive. 111111111121221211112.title: Seth

1111111111212212111122.content:
Seth knew that Shadow was at full strength and he knew that Shadow could sense him. Seth needed to het his DNA sample from Jasmine, but how would he be able to get it, and avoid fighting?

"I can feel his aura, it feels like it's getting closer and closer by the minute." Shadow said. "Just get ready. I shouldn't be this worked up about nothing."

"All right." Kate said. "I guess you're right."

Just then, Seth jumped out the bushes, and made a quick slash across Jasmine.

"OW!" Jasmine said. "Something just hit me."
"Seth!" Jak said. He just went in that direction of those trees."
"All right then," Shadow said. "Looks like were going on a deamon hunt."

"Nostory, they're after me." Seth said.
"Get out of there, and if there is a confrontation, don't waste time getting back here." Nostory said.
"Got it." Seth said.

Do they get to Seth or does he escape with Jasmine's DNA Sample?
1111111111212212111122.title: Seth gets his DNA sample.

11111111112122121111221.content:
Seth, thought it was the perfect time to call up a portal and get out of the Heroes sight.

"Nostory, I am about to enter the portal, and I've got Jasmine's DNA." Seth said.
"Good, I also have a chance to get some of the Deamons here. And I think we will be able get my lair back here as well."

Meanwhile, as the Heroes were closely behind...
"Shadow, we still have a lock on Seth?" Kate said.
"Yes, I can still feel his presence." Shadow said.
"I have an idea." Jasmine said. "I can dive bomb on Seth. I can Jump, and then shrink down to my normal size and hit Seth from behind."
"Hey Jas, are you sure about this?" Jak said. "I don' think tha-"
"Listen, Luigi-Boogums, I'll be completely fine. Don't worry about me all right? And besides, you guys are right behind me." Jasmine said.
"Ok, I guess so." Jak said. "Get him!"

And with that, Jasmine jumped into the air, and started to shrink to a height of 5'4. And she saw Seth. "Oh Seth, You're mine." She thought. And at the same time, a portal started to appear under Seth. Jasmine tackled Seth, and they both vanished.

"Hm. I've lost Seth's aura." Shadow said. "I also can't sense Jasmine's aura anymore..."
"I think Jasmine tackled Seth, but he must have summoned a portal, and Jasmine ended up following him." Jak said. "I think we should try and find were Nostory's hiding."
"And the Deamon hunt continues." Kate said.
11111111112122121111221.title: He Escapes, With some company.

111111111121221211112212.content:
Seth tumbled out of the portal, truimphant at his return. He held up his blade, Jasmine's blood dripping from it as he waved it around. ' I have it Nostory and now we shall clone her.' said Seth. Nostory did not say anything but sensed something else coming out from the portal. At that moment, his eyes widened as Jasmine herself came in.

Jasmine did not know what had happened, it happpened too quickly for her to comprehend. The moment she looked up, Nostory hit with a spell. Black beams radiated out from his hand and engulfed before being absorbed by her body. Jasmine got up, slightly weakened but still strong. She began to grow, her body filling up the space quickly but as she hit the 7 foot mark, she felt an agonising pain in her chest.

She stopped growing and began to shrink to her normal height of 5 foot 4 inches. She felt helpless, without her ability to grow she was just a normal girl, albeit still a goddess. " My,my, feeling little are we?" Nostory said, it took Jasmine awhile to recognise Nostory as a 19 year boy. " So what have you been up to?" she asked him.

Nostory did not respond but ordered Maroni's men to take her away. " See if you can do something simple." he said under his breath while they dragged her away. Maroni came into the room and almost laughed. " So you've been asking us to go after a little girl?" He said, sniggering. " She is a goddess with great power, it is only by the charm I placed on her that prevents her from destroying us." she said to him.

Maroni seemed to believe him as he knew what Nostory could do and if that was real, then Jasmine's powers were probably real too. Seth came up to Nostory, her blood in a vial ready for the cloning. " All ready for cloning an evil goddess." said Seth.
111111111121221211112212.title: Go to Villains.

1111111111212212111122122.content:
Nostory started to get a cloning chamber ready, and with a evil goddess, Nostory and Seth would be more of a force to be reckoned with.

"Nostory, where exactly did you come from?" Maroni said.

"It was a world that was once combined with this world, long ago. There were many mythical being in the world. And the-" Nostory was interrupted.

"Can't you make it short?" Maroni said

"Basically, the world where I came from was combined, but separtated from reality, then someone, who you'll see when the time comes, came to our world and was able to make the worlds one again, and here we are." Nostory explained, as he dropped the vial to start the process.

"Hm. That's quite a story you got there." Maroni said.

Suddenly, a voice said: Coloning Complete.

"That didn't take long at all." Seth said.

"True. If this is the case, then we should have a almost identical Jasmine." Nostory said.

Just then, a girl came out of the chamber. Her long black hair blocked one of her dark purple eyes. Her legs were smooth with no blemish or flaws of any kind. Her chest was perfect for her proportions. In other words, drop dead evil and gorgeous.

"Everyone, meet Yasmin." Nostory said, pleased at the Evil Version of the Goddess Jasmine.
1111111111212212111122122.title: The Birth of Yasmin.

11111111112122121111221221.content:
Yasmin smiled at Nostory and began to grow, Nostory smiled back as his clone had the powers of the original Jasmine. She stopped growing at 8 feet tall, tall enough to tower over everyone in the room. Maroni looked shocked as he craned his neck to look at the evil goddess. " What do you wish for me to do?" she asked Nostory.

' Seth, brief her on her mission will you?" Nostory asked Seth as he brought Maroni to the room to discuss his plans. Yasmin looked down at Seth who told her to sit a nearby table. ' Yasmin, you are a clone. " said Seth. Yasmin did not say anything. ' You are to create havoc in the town so the girl we cloned you from Jasmine will be hunted by the authorities on this world." said Seth.

" But what if she fights the authorities?" Yasmin asked Seth, he could tell she wanted to get started as soon as possible. " Unlike you, Jasmine doesn't like to hurt people so she will run. " said Seth. " What a wimp." said Yasmin, unpleased she was cloned from someone who couldn't take a life. ' But I heard Jasmine is here." said Yasmin. ' Nostory is going to send her back, she does not know the location of this base and we will wipe her memory to make sure she does not recall any of this.' said Seth.
11111111112122121111221221.title: Continue...

choices: To the Villains, who aren't far off behind.
111111111121221211112212211.content:
"And we still can't find out where she is..." Jak said. "What if Nostory hurt her, and-"
"Jak, calm down, I am sure she's all right." Shadow said. "And like she said, she can take care of herself."
"I still can't find any trace of Jasmine." Kate said. "I think that-"

Then sereval giant footfalls were heard far off in the distance, and they started to get closer and closer. Suddenly, Jasmine came walking into the direction of Shadow, Jak and, Kate.

"Jasmine!" Jak said. "You're all right?"
"Yeah, just a little dizzy." Jasmine said. "I don't remember what happened after we decided to get Seth."
"As long as your all right," Jak said. "I was worried."
"Aww." Jasmine said. "You were worried about me...that's so sweet of you."
"Well, now that your back, how about we get some rest?" Kate said.
"We all need to get some rest." Shadow said. "But it's good to see everything turned out all right."
111111111121221211112212211.title: Jasmine returns.

choices: Yasmin and Jak (This Should be Interesting.)
Stay with Nostory, Seth, and Jasmine.
1111111111212212111122122112.content:
"Yasmin, as much as we want you to start getting Jasmine in a heap of trouble, we think this would be a good time to get some intel from the heroes." Nostory said.
"And you will act as Jasmine." Seth said.
"This shouldn't be too hard." Yasmin said. "I'll take care of Jak."

Meanwhile, the Heroes were about to get some sleep, and Jak and Jasmine was about to do their regular fun time before the night was done.

"You ready to play our games?" Jasmine said.
"You know it. Let's get outside to get me small." Jak said.

They both went outside, but Nostory, Seth, and Yasmin were about to strike.

"I am going to go inside to hit the bathroom, I'll be right back." Jak went inside.

"All right, Seth hit Jasmine with the same spell that I used earlier. Yasmin, as soon as we capture Jasmine, get to Jak." Nostory said.

Soon, Seth went and hit Jasmine with the same spell, and Jasmine was shrinking again.

"All right, Jasmine, you're coming with me and Nostory." Seth said.
"Why..I am I shrinking." Jasmine said. "You're going to pay for this Seth, just wait..."
"Here," Seth said, as he and Jasmine were going to the villains. "Is your replacement."
"Hi, Jasmine." Yasmin said. "Glad to finally meet you."
"No way..." Jasmine said, as she looked at her twin. "You can't be me. This is crazy."
"Look at me," Yasmin said, as she started to grow to 50 feet. "I am you, just more powerful."
"No....this isn't happening...." Jasmine said.
"Believe it." Yasmin said. "You aren't the only goddess anymore. I had better get to your boyfriend before he worries."
"...Jak." Jasmine said.

"Good job, everyone." Nostory said. "Things are going as planned. Now, back to the hideout everyone. Yasmin, we will keep in touch with you."

Jak came out, and Yasmin was waiting for him.
"All right, ready Jasmine." Jak said.
"All ready." Yasmin said.
1111111111212212111122122112.title: Trading Places: Featruing Jasmine and Yasmin.

11111111112122121111221221121.content:
The false goddess and her "boyfriend" were in Jasmine's room.
"Well, Jasmine...." Jak said, nervous showing in his voice. "You're acting a little too playful..."
"Oh come on, you like it." Yasmin said, licking her lips.
"Eh. I am tried." Jak said. "Tomorrow?"
"Aww...Please...Jak?" Yasmin said, sounding a little more sexy...
"Fine." Jak said. "You got me with the puppy dog face."

Yasmin and Jak kept going. Jak was kinda getting more and more nervous, that his "girlfriend" kept trying to you know....but he was young and didn't want that. Yasmin however, was enjoying the power and domination she had over her enemy. Then again, she also had some feelings for Jak. But, then again ruling the world with Nostory is better.

"....wow." Jak said. "Jasmine, you just showed me another side of you..."
"Didn't expect it huh?" Yasmin said. "Way more cooler than her...I mean, before right."
"Right. Well I am going to sleep. I'll be in my room tonight." Jak said. "That's okay with you?"
"Go ahead Jak." Yasmin said. "I'll see you later."

Jak then went to sleep in his room of the Deathray. He felt that tonight wasn't the same. Jasmine was kinda different, in terms of the things that she did before. But this new side wasn't what Jak expected. He went to sleep, trying to shake it off.
11111111112122121111221221121.title: Yasmin treats Jak like a toy....but has feelings?

choices: Back to the Heroes and Yasmin, who has that Intel.
111111111121221211112212211212.content:
"I swear, if she puts one hand on Jak, I might just have to kill her." Jasmine said.
"Hm." Nostory said. "How could he know the difference? You two are the same, and he probably doesn't know it."
"SHUT UP!" Jasmine said, Slightly breaking the spell that held her from growing.
"Oh, is the goddess getting a little angry?" Seth said. "Want a cookie?"
"SHUT UP!!!" Jasmine said, getting a little bigger. "I wouldn't keep going if I were you..."
"Think of it, Jak enjoying the comfort and protection of Yasmin." Nostory said, snickering.

"THAT'S IT." Jasmine said, suddenly, growing to a height of 50 feet, and grabbing Nostory and Seth. "Now I got you both."
"H-H-How did you get out of the-" Nostory said.
"Be quiet." Jasmine said. "If I were you, I wouldn't be talking right now."
"Hey boss, I-" Maroni stopped. "What happened here?"
"Maroni, get out of here. You aren't no match for her." Seth said.
"Call Yasmin. NOW." Nostory said. "Hit that red button. Now!"

Maroni ran to the control center of Nostory's lair, which was a little farout west on the ocean of California. Jasmine tried to get Maroni. But she was too late, as he hit the button, and Yasmin would receive a distress call.

"Hit it." Maroni said. "I am out of here." He ran away.

Seth suddenly used an energy attack to break out of Jasmine's grasp.

"Good." Nostory said. "Now set me free and we should be able to have a ligitimate chance of beating her."

Jasmine suddenly threw Nostory through some walls of his lair.

"All right Seth." Jasmine said. "Let's see if you can handle a 16 year old goddess."
"Heh. Aren't you confident." Seth said, as he dashed toward Jasmine.
111111111121221211112212211212.title: Anger helps for any situation, hands down.

1111111111212212111122122112121.content:
Jasmine readied herself for Seth's attack, in which she quickly used her fist to block Seth's punch. Seth then jumped back, and fired a dark energy ball, which she deflected back at Seth, which hit him. Seth was appealed at Jasmine's skill. He started to engage in combat with Jasmine, in which she was able to keep up. They both exchanged rapid kicks and punches.

Outside, people who were walking around L.A. was disturbed by the battle, as Jasmine's steps were causing small tremors throughout the city. It wasn't like an earthquake, but people noticed it. Jasmine also started to feel Jak, and started get even more uneasy than she has been about him before. She slowly started to have even more affection for Jak, almost like her senses when Jak was in trouble were sharpened.

"Oh Jak..." Jasmine said. "I have to save you from that awful wanna-be me."
"You're going to be too late." Seth said. "He might be dead."
"No," Jasmine said, grabbing Seth with and charging up a light beam in her hand. "I know my boyfriend is still alive, I just need to save him."
"How did you get so powerful???" Seth said.
"I don't know..." Jasmine then threw Seth into the air. "But I have to protect Jak, and fill in for both of us."

She then shot the energy beam at Seth, and his eyes widened, and he was engulfed by the beam. Jasmine then shrunk back to her original height and started to run back to the Deathray. Nostory woke up and and went back to the place where the battle took place. Seth, who was bruised, fell off a wall that he was hit into when Jasmine fired her beam.

"Seth!" Nostory said. "Who did this...to you?"
"Jasmine..." Seth said. "I didn't take her seriously, she's gotten more powerful...."
"Alright," Nostory said. "We have to take her more as a threat."
"Agreed..." Seth said. "I am going to heal..."
"Looks like were going have a challenge ahead of us..." Nostory said. "Rest up, Seth. I'll contact Yasmin."
1111111111212212111122122112121.title: Jasmine vs. Seth

11111111112122121111221221121211.content:
Jak woke up on the flat, soft stomach, which belonged to Yasmin. He still wasn't aware that Jasmine wasn't there and that he's with a potential danger in Yasmin, but he was about to find out.

"Uhh..." Jak said. "Jasmine played with me rough....She wouldn't go that far."
"Hello there, sweetie." Yasmin said, sounding as sweet as her double.
"....Hey." Jak said, slightly sore from all the roughplay Yasmin imposed. "Hey, could you not be so rough next time? It wasn't like you."
"Well..." Yasmin kissed him, making him fall over. "I'll try..."

Meanwhile, Jasmine, who was just coming up toward the Deathray, was running.

"Good Morning, Jasmine." Shadow said. "What's the big rush- why do you look like you were in a battle?"
"S-Shadow," Jasmine said, still running. "Follow me. I'll explain."

Jasmine and Shadow went to the place where Jak and Yasmin was; Jasmine's room.


"J-Jasmine?" Shadow said. "There's two?"
"No," Yasmin said, "I'm the real one!"
Jak looked up at Yasmin. "J-Jasmine....? You're the real one right?"
"Of course I am..." Yasmin said, petting his head softly.
"J-JAK!" Jasmine said. "YOU'RE STICKING WITH HER??!?!?"
"I-uh...." Jak was looking at both of the Goddesses. "Jasmine, I-"
"Yeah, he is." Yasmin said, sticking her tongue out. "Fake."
"You're the fake!" Jasmine said. "That's it."

Jasmine tackled Yasmin to the ground.
"What's is his nickname!" Jasmine said.
"Who's?" Yasmin said.
"DON'T ACT STUPID! JAK'S!!!!" Jasmine said, yelling
"Uh......" Yasmin said. "Alright," She shot a small, dark, energy blast. "You got me."

Jasmine went flying out the Deathray, and she was starting to grow as well.
"You believe me now?" Jasmine said, reaching for her now super small boyfriend.
11111111112122121111221221121211.title: Jasmine encounters her twin.

choices: Or you could go to those snakes Nostory and Seth.
111111111121221211112212211212111.content:
Jasmine put Jak in her boobs, just to at least grow him back to normal size.
"I'm sorry, Jas." Jak said. "You two look the same, and um-"
"Don't worry about it." Jasmine said, kissing Jak. "It's not your fault."
"Now that's the affection I know...." Jak said.

Jasmine sat Jak back down in her room.
"Just stay there while I beat the crap out of this fake." Jasmine said.
"Got it." Jak said. "Shadow, you're going to help her?"
"I suppose so," Shadow said. "For all we know, this is more of a bigger problem."
"That's right." Jak said. "She could get the real Jasmine in trouble..."
"Well," Shadow said, powering up in his dark aura. "Were in for another big adventure."
"Good luck out there." Jak said.

Shadow nodded, and dashed toward Jasmine's side. Yasmin grew to 100 ft, the height which Jasmine was.
"Well, well," Yasmin said. "This is going to be interesting..."
"Your going to pay for touching my boyfriend..." Jasmine said.
"He liked it...." Yasmin said.
"Let's go!" Jasmine said.

Both Yasmin and Jasmine clenched their hands together, a brutal fight to begin.
111111111121221211112212211212111.title: The warm-up.....

1111111111212212111122122112121111.content:
Yasmin tried to knee Jasmine, but failed as Jasmine grabbed her leg, and smashed her to the ground, causing a huge rumble. Yasmin looked up in suprise, and smiled.

"You're not as bad as I thought," Yasmin said.
"Thanks." Jasmine said.

Yasmin then spring up with a kick forcing Jasmine back little, but she recoved quickly. They followed up, trading kicks and punches. They were fighting blow by blow.

Yasmin then got a distress call from Nostory and Seth. I gotta go, Yasmin thought. As Jasmine was going to land a hit on Yasmin, she teleported, the battle was over...for now.

"She got away!" Jasmine said. "She must have gotten scared."
"Well, I guess that's over." Shadow said, who didn't get to fight at all.
"We got to find Nostory and Seth, before this gets out of hand." Jasmine said.
1111111111212212111122122112121111.title: Alright, a short lived real fight.

11111111112122121111221221121211111.content:
"Jak!" Jasmine suddenly grabbed her boyfriend from the broken hole in her room. "I hope you're alright."
"Jasmine," Jak said. "I am fine."
"I know, It's..." Jasmine said "...I just don't want to lose you."
"I know you weren't with me for a full day, but nothing bad happened." Jak said.
"But," Jasmine said, pulling Jak closer to her face. "You don't understand. I really really can't stand the thought of losing you, and if that happens, I wouldn't know what to do. You are like....the only person I can't live about." Her eyes started to tear up. "I know I tell you this alot, and were young and all, but...I really love you, Jak. And I'll always be there. I'll be your hero, and I'll be your protector..." Jasmine softly gave him a kiss, which was almost heavenly. "Like I said, I always have to fill in for both of us...and I'll do that as best as I can."

"Jasmine, I love you too." Jak said. "I just dont know...what to say....what you just said means alot...."
11111111112122121111221221121211111.title: Jasmine gets more affectionate than ever!

111111111121221211112212211212111111.content:
"It's fine." Jasmine said. "But now, I am going to be more careful with you."
"Ok," Jak said. "I understand."
"Now..." Jasmine said, wiping her tears from her eyes. "Let's go inside...I think we both deserve some R and R."
"Sounds good to me." Jak said.

Later, when Jasmine and Jak were in Jak's room, while the hole was still being repaired by Shadow. The two were watching Glee on Fox(Which is a really good show.)

"This show is great." Jak said.
"Yeah, and you cuddling under me is even better..." Jasmine said.
"But, of course." Jak said, looking up, from Jasmine's lap "You're a Goddess, and a hot one at that."
"Your so sweet..." Jasmine said. "Ready?"
"To play?" Jak said. "You know it."
"Alright," Jasmine said. "Let me see something."

Jak sat up, and cut off the T.V. and Jasmine held out her hand, and Jak held it. Suddenly, Jasmine started to focus on shrinking to 8 inches. And Jak, who was holding her hand to share that effect, started to feel a tangle. They both shrunk.

"Whoa," Jak said. "This works better, at least we don't have to go outside."
"Yeah," Jasmine said. "But, I can't deal with this size."
"It's cool," Jak said.
"Not for me...." Jasmine said, growing back to her 5'2 height. "But now, it's time to play wittle Luigi-Boogums...."
111111111121221211112212211212111111.title: Jasmine and Jak keep it going.

1111111111212212111122122112121111111.content:
Jasmine reached down with her open palm, into which Jak jumped on to.

"Your so small..." Jasmine said. "It's almost giving me the urge to....suck on you."
"O....kay???" Jak said, nervously.
"Lick...you." Jasmine said. "Like your a lollypop."
"Uh...." Jak said. "Yasmin, it's not going to happen."
"It's not me." Jasmine said. "It's not Yasmin either."
"Well," Jak said, jumping off her palm, "I don't like where this might be going."

Jak landed on the floor and started to run out, under the door, only to find out that there was darkness. Jak started to be overcome with worry and some fear.

"Oh Jak." Jasmine said, growing. "You just don't get it. You can't do anything about me."
"What the-" Jak said. "What's is wrong with you?"
"Oh nothing," Jasmine said. "Just using my power. And soon the whole world will be under me..."

Jasmine soon grew to a massive 1000 ft height.
"Maybe....I don't need you anymore." Jasmine said, lifting her foot up slowly.

Jak looked up in horror as Jasmine's foot was hovering down on him, and he knew that he was dead, the pressure started to slowly crush him into nothingness....
1111111111212212111122122112121111111.title: Just Maybe, your girlfriend has too much power...

11111111112122121111221221121211111111.content:
"UH!" Jak said, waking up with cold sweat.
"Jak, what's wrong!" Jasmine said.
"Just had a nightmare..." Jak said. "You grew too tall, and then you crushed me."
"Really." Jasmine said. "I wouldn't do that, Jak...I love you."
"I know. It's just that it's weird thinking that you would do something like that." Jak said.
"Let's just get some sleep." Jasmine said. "That twin of mine must have put that in your head..."
"I guess so...." Jak said.
11111111112122121111221221121211111111.title: Nightmare...

111111111121221211112212211212111111112.content:
"This is bad," Nostory said. "How did she get more powerful?"
"I don't know." Seth said, attending to his wounds. "Where's-"
"I got the distress call..." Yasmin said. "Seth, what happened to you?"
"Jasmine did this," Nostory said. "I didn't mean to call you back this early, but we have to regroup."
"Yeah..." Yasmin said. "I wanted to rip her to shreds...."
"It's fine." Nostory said. "You got caught, and we didn't expect her to fight at a high level."
"Whatever." Seth said. "We've got to get Sal to kidnap Jak."

"Getting the boy again..." Nostory said. "I don't see why."
"I'm guessing we aren't going to bring in other Deamons..." Seth said.
"No need to." Nostory said. "We are perfectly capable of taking them down by ourselves. Jasmine is really nothing without her powers...Jak isn't a danger....yet."
"What do you mean?" Seth said. "I don't see anything in him."
"Me neither." Nostory said. "But I still have some concern about him."
"Shadow." Seth said.
"That's right." Nostory said. "He is unpredictable at this point. And then there's Kate."

"Is there anything to do?" Yasmin said. "T.V?"
"I'm going to get Sal...." Seth said. "I'll tell him to get you an T.V."
"She is part human..." Nostory said. "She must have their same human nature...."
"I'm going to train." Yasmin said. "Might as well."
"Good." Nostory said, smiling under his sliver mask. "Time to finish what we started."
111111111121221211112212211212111111112.title: An interesting delvopment?

1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
"Please?"
"No."
"Pleaseeeee?
"No......"
"With a cherry on top?"
"Sorry."

Jasmine had been trying to shrink Jak, but he wanted to do normal things that a couple does...However, Jasmine wasn't having it. Jak knew that Jasmine loved her powers, but he decided that she needed to relax with it.

"Why?" Jasmine said. "I thought you loved being shrunk."
"I do." Jak said. "It's just that I can't do it 24/24."
"Your kidding." Jasmine said. "You were obessed with it a year ago."
"When I was 14. I'm 15...." Jak said.
"Come on." Jasmine said, she started to hold Jak's hand.
"No..." Jak said "Listen I-" He found himself looking at her boobs..."
"Got ya!" Jasmine said, playfully. "Your my wittle boy!"
"....Since when you are able to shrink me like that...." Jak said.
"I've been practicing." Jasmine said. "But it's just for you...."

Jak turned away from his now huge-to-him girlfriend. He was walking on the bed, which had became a huge land of pink cover. Jasmine layed down on her stomach. She watched her boyfriend walk around. She had her fingers walking towards him

"Jasmine...." Jak said. "I don't want to play...."
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: Jak is bit annoyed with his Goddess....

choices: We learn of Jak and Jasmine's relationship in deeper understanding.
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
"I don't want to play Jasmine," Jak said. "I had a nightmare about Yasmin or you, or...." He stopped, and he could only think about how he could be fooled so easily. Between his girlfriend and a clone, he was scared. Sure, he was only Jasmine's BF. But what if Yasmin caught him again? Jak was worried.

"Jak," Jasmine said, picking her 1 inch boyfriend up. "Are you that scared?"

"Yes," Jak said. "Yasmin could have killed me, or used me..." Thoughts raced through his mind, and they weren't very positive thoughts.

"I'll make sure she never touches you again." Jasmine said, clinching her hand into a fist, while the other hand rocking Jak, almost soothing him. "I promise. You are my wittle boy, and no one else’s." Jasmine then kissed Jak, and to Jak it felt heavenly, her lips making contact with his small body.

"Better?" Jasmine said.

"Way better." Jak said.

"Jak listen..." Jasmine said. "You know why we are going out right?"

"Um, Yeah." Jak said. "We have strong feelings for each other?"

"You're so silly, but not only that..." Jasmine said.
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: Jasmine's reasoning and Jak finally understands.

1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
Jasmine then sat Jak near her lap, Jak felt that the talk was about to get serious. He sat up intently, getting ready to take in what his GF had to say.

"When I first met you, back in our freshmen year, I saw a quiet kid who was smart, but that's it." Jasmine said. "You were the butt of everyone's joke's.

*Few hours ago.*

Shadow was on his super-computer, doing some research and looking at notes. He was trying to figure why and how Jak was the key to the worlds being one again. He then remember something that Lucius told him before they came to Earth....

(A year ago, in That World...)

"Jak could be more than the dreamer who knows our world...." Lucius said. "Jak has a special power inside him."

"A power?" Shadow said. "But how? Why?"

"Once before," Lucius said. "There was a man that was bestowed great powers...those powers were used to protect the planet. Where they come from however, is a mystery. They are called the Omega Bloodline powers...."

"Omega Bloodline?" Shadow said. "Isn't that a legend? To this very day still? No one has ever discovered it or came within reach of finding out the mystery behind it!

"Correct..." Lucius said. "All the details were that, 'Thou dreamer with pure heart and kindness shall be chosen to undertake an Omega power; that shall be used to rid the earth of scared and unimaginable evil.' That could very well match Jak, as he did dream our world up, and now it is reality once again..."

"I see..." Shadow said. "You think Jak will be that guy? I mean he has great courage, no doubt, but I can't see him as the fighting type..."

"Jak fights for what is right, and he's willing to do anything to help his friends." Lucius said. "If the legend is true, then Jak will step into that role, of being the one who is given those powers. No one will ever know what was the Omega Bloodline was like in the past...but in the nearby future, Jak could be the one to show that amazing power..."

"I see..." Shadow said. "Should I tell him?"

"No." Lucius said. "The time will come where you'll reveal this to him, Shadow. Possibly when he is coming of age, around 17 or 18 years old..."

"Alright. Understood." Shadow said. "Well Lucius...I guess this it then. Good luck...I know you'll be watching us."

"Right. It is time for me and the remaining High Angels to take our place back into the heavens..." Lucius said. "We will keep an eye out for you, along with Kate, Jak, and Jasmine. Good luck to you Shadow. And I'm proud that you realize that this is for a greater good..."

"Of course..." Shadow said. "Knowing that Nostory wants to have power...it isn't right. I'll do my best. Farewell Lucius."

*Back to the present.*

'Well. he's 15 now..." Shadow said. "Two years isn't much to wait for..."

"Let's get this day started..." Shadow said.

"Jas!" Jak immediately realized what Jasmine was going to do. "Don't do it yet!"

Kate turned off the stove, and quickly dashed after Jasmine. Meanwhile Jak just stood on the table...realizing that he had to stay put until someone came and got him.

Jasmine ran into the holding cell block of the Deathray and Shadow quickly teleported in front of Jasmine.

"Hey!" Jasmine said, with a little anger in her voice. "Let me crush her, that's one threat we can get rid of! She would make things more difficult. I feel like it wouldn't be the last time she tries to pull a twin switch again."

"Listen," Shadow explained. "We need to get information from her, in order to prevent Nostory and Seth from doing more damage to the world. We can't kill her yet."

Jasmine then sighed, and then said, "Ok fine...I understand. But we were having a conversation about our lives outside of this. Me and Jak still have to go through high school and things. I mean, don't get me wrong, I enjoy preventing evil and being a goddess, but I do want to be a normal teenager..."

Kate finally caught up to Jasmine. "Oh. You've already stopped her. I was worried there for a second."

"She's just upset is all." Shadow said. "For the time being, I have a idea to propose to you two. I've already thought ahead of all of this."

"Look at you being mindful and planning ahead." Kate said. "That's cute."

Shadow slightly blushed. "Let's talk about this over breakfast."

Jak was sitting, and just looking up at the ceiling. The smell of the food hovered over him, and his stomach was growling. Luckily, he wouldn't have to wait any longer, as Shadow, Kate, and Jasmine entered the kitchen. Kate started to gather plates to serve food, and Shadow and Jasmine took their seats.

"Jak," Shadow said. "Morning. I think you already know what we'll be discussing as we eat."

"Of course." Jak said. "How would we handle school and other things, right?"

"Precisely." Shadow continued. "Now, here's my proposal. Jasmine, you're a cheerleader. Which means you'll be partaking in sports to cheer your team on right?" Jasmine nodded. "And Jak, will you be trying to participate in anything outside of school?"

Jak had three things in mind. He wanted to join the football team, international club, and the school newspaper. However, he felt like he also had a commitment to helping the cause of preventing the world's end from Nostory and Shadow. He quickly settled on one thing.

"Joining the football team." Jak said.

"WHAT!" Jasmine said. "I don't want you-"

"I know," Jak said, knowing his girlfriend was going to flip out. "You don't want me to get hurt, or injured. But I feel like this will toughen me up. It'll be ok. You'll be at the home games and you'll see what happens. And plus if I workout with team, I'll look even cuter when I'm shrunk....you'd have a slightly bulker Luigi-Boogums."

Jasmine laughed, and then accepted it. "Ok then. I believe in you."

"Ok then. It's settled. You guys will be able to enjoy those things, and we'll give you guys breaks on your dances, and such." Shadow said. "I think you'll guys will be able to balance these things well. Me and Kate will be able to handle minor occurrences. Our first goal for us, is to take out most of the deamons as they enter this world. We want make it to where it's mainly Me, Seth, and Nostory as the three. Of course, as much as the worlds are becoming one again, we want to prevent the environment from overtaking this world. We want to keep the earth's current environment the same. Kate will explain the rest to you.

Kate then served plates, and continued where Shadow left off.

"We're sure Nostory and Seth want to twist this to be like the world you guys saw back in the dream...so we're going to have to force it to where those elements won't exist. As for L.O.R....they're working on being on another world where they don't have to inhabit earth. Lucius is currently not with us because of that reason, but we will see him as we going though this...but the eradication of the deamons is the important thing, then preventing the worlds from completely merging. And lastly...stopping Seth and Nostory."

Jasmine and Jak looked at each other, and nodded.

"We're in." Jak said. "Sounds like a win-win."

"Saving the world, and being normal high school kids," Jasmine smiled. "I think this will be an interesting high school life to live."

Jasmine then grew her boyfriend back to his 5'7 height, so that he could eat.

"Alright then." Shadow said. "Glad to hear you guys are committed into this thing."
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: A bigger commitment, beyond school.

choices: The Deathray has no problems and leaves LA immediately
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
"Ok...with that being said...." Kate said. "It's time to get you two back home."

"Right!" Jak said. "Wait. Our parents...they probably wondered what happened to us! We should have-"

"Yes, he's with me." Jasmine said, talking on a cell phone. "We accidentally crashed at a friend's house...is he in trouble?"

Jak's mouth dropped to the floor. He feared that his girlfriend might be talking to his parents...who knew about Jasmine, as they found her to be a great person. But he was worried that he might be grounded upon returning to his house. "It's my fault. I was distracting him...sorry." Jasmine continued the conversation with Jak's mother. A little chit chat later, he was handed the phone.

"Hi mom." Jak said, eating his breakfast. "I'm sorry I didn't call you guys right away. Forgive me, it won't happen again...Yes, I was with Jasmine. We crashed at a friends, he didn't want to drive us home at the moment, and we decided to stay the night. I doubt Jasmine called her parents either, so I'm sure we both are grounded...I'm not? Thanks! I promise, it won't happen again. Sorry for worrying you guys. I'll be home soon! Bye."

"How'd that go?" Jasmine said.

"They let me off the hook this time." Jak said. "They said, 'when your 18, we won't worry as much, but you're still a kid.'"

"Good, now for my parents..." Jasmine said. "Daddy might be upset at-"

"Hello. Yes she's with me now..." Jak said. "That is correct. We were at a friends house and didn't think to call for rides. She's safe sir, I assure you. I'm not going to let anything happen to her." Jasmine blushed, knowing that Jak and her father gets along fairly well. "I'll have her home soon, see you soon sir."

"Hello Dad." Jasmine said. "I'm okay. Jak has been taking great care of me. Of course. Can Jak come over? He can? Thanks Dad, I'll see you soon. Love you too. Bye."

Kate and Shadow went ahead and cleaned off the table after everyone has eaten.

"Ok then." Jak said. "Next stop, home."

"Well, I'm guessing you're going to be at home for a little bit Luigi-Boogums?" Jasmine said.

"Yes, my parents possibly want me to be at home for a bit before a leave the house again."

"Same here." Jasmine then layed her head on Jak's chest. "We can hang tomorrow. It's Sunday and we could watch football all day."

Jak's eyes widened. "REALLY."

"Mhmm..." Jasmine said, her eyes staring into Jak's eyes. "Of course, there will a catch."

"I bet I know what it is..." Jak smiled a bit.

Kate started to engage the Deathray's engines, and Shadow started up the nav system.

"Alright guys, we're taking you guys back home...It's important that you guys be available at all times." Shadow said. "We'll be able to travel at light speeds between places, so don't worry about distance. We'll give you guys Sunday, but Monday, be prepared to get into the scheduled plan."

"Got it." Jasmine and Jak said.

"Engaging Grav Warp Drive." Kate said. "You may want to hold on to something..."
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: Parents...

1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
"Wait." Shadow said. "One of us needs to stay in this state to keep an eye on Nostory and Seth. They are established here in Los Angeles. I'll stay behind. Make the quick trip and drop those two back home."

"You sure?" Kate said, looking at Shadow. "What if you get into trouble?"

"I can handle myself." Shadow said, shapeshifting into a human. "You need to get those two home. They need to get used to their new lives."

Kate nodded.

"Get dressed."

Jasmine and Jak went ahead and changed into everyday clothing, while Kate started to get the Deathray ready for their trip back home. Jak repacked all his things, and Jasmine did the same. However, they were aware of the crazy stress that was going to be upon them. Not being able to experience their high school lives to the fullest, they understood the sacrifice that had to be made.

Jak knew that this would be an interesting four years of high school, but this'll be some quick growing up. Not that it bothered him. A lot of juggling around to do, but he assured himself that he was capable of handling it.

Jasmine on the on hand, had to reassure her parents she'd continue to do good in school and be involved in a lot of activities. However, she knew she could only do one thing, so she stuck to her first love, which was cheerleading. She was ready. Jak would at least by her side, so it would be easier.

Jak and Jasmine came back into the ship's main navigator hub. Kate was at the helm of the ship.

"You guys ready to go home?" Kate said. "Just put in your addresses and we'll take off."

"Alright..." Jak said. "Here...we are....and as for Jasmine's..."

"Oh..." Jasmine said, blushing said. "You remember my address? By heart?"

"How else would I have sent those Valentine Day flowers?" Jak said.

Jasmine smiled and kissed her boyfriend on the cheek. Shadow soon entered, but as a lean muscular male human. He had the appearance with brown hair, and blue eyes.

"I'll stay at one of the hotels." Shadow said, "I'll blend in, and luckily, I was able to get the currency used here in this world."

"How did you get money?" Jak asked, curious.

"Remember those thugs who attacked you guys? I tracked a few of them down last night, and got some infomation on the guy Maroni and Nostory." Shadow explained. "Apparently, they confirmed that they were working for Seth and Nostory, and in exchange for their services, Maroni may become trouble. Nostory may try to make one of them into a higher up. I wouldn't doubt if we see a human-deamon hybrid. We need to stop the merging of the worlds...and I believe Nostory will try to unleash the entire deamon horde onto earth...."

"We gotta stop that from happening." Jak said. "Is there anyway we can try to stop them from getting to earth?"

"We have to travel back to the other reality to do that." Shadow said. "I imagine that Nostory will do that at the end. But you're right Jak, we can't wait for them to get here, they'll decimate this world easily. For now...just get home and focus on school. We'll be in contact."

Kate punched in the coordinates to get Jak and Jasmine home. "Get strapped in you two. Shadow, I'll be back before tonight. You best not get into trouble."

"I'm done. I'll continue to piece together clues of what we know so far."

With that, Kate, Jak, and Jasmine went on, as the Deathray went into cloaked mode. Shadow traveled to a nearby hotel in downtown LA. But not before being followed silently by one of Maroni's thugs. He didn't see where the Deathray was headed, but saw Shadow and assumed he was Jak.



"Report back to the Boss." a voice said. "We know the location of one of the kids."
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: Nostory's Plan

1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.content:
Shadow set up shop in the hotel room, setting up recon, and figured that some of thugs may be staying in a room themselves. Shadow looked outside his window, seeing the streets, seeing people going about their business. 'Those people, it's a shame they don't know what danger they are in.' Shadow closed his hotel window, and continued to do his research of the Omega Legend. 'Lucius said that Jak is that dreamer who'll bring peace to the world once again. Makes sense, as he did bring the worlds back together.'

There was a knock on the door. Shadow quickly shapeshifted into a human and answered.

"Who is it?" Shadow asked.

"Room Service." an gruff Italian voice said.

"I appreciate it, but I didn't request it."

"It's free food sir."

"I SAID no."

"Well we need to inspect the room, Jak."

'So they're here for the kids...' Shadow said. 'Maybe if I play this the right way, they'll lead right me to Nostory and Seth.'

"Alright. Come in." Shadow said, opening the door. Two men, dressed in all black rushed in the room. One of them tackled Shadow, but swiftly, the deamon headbutted the man knocking him out, and got up. The other man, who had shades on, shot a assault rifle at Shadow, but the bullets had no effect. Shadow moved at a quick speed, disarming the man with the gun, and dismantled the gun quickly.

"Damn it, he never said that this kid had powers!" the man with shades said, trying to make a run for it. Shadow quickly shut the door and held the man against a wall, then reverting back to his Deamon form.

"Y-You're one of the-" the man was shocked

"That's right. I'm a deamon like Nostory and Seth." Shadow said. "I'm not the boy your looking for. But maybe you can help me find the two I mentioned just now."

"I'm not telling you anything - ack!" The thug was getting choked.

"Unless you want to see what's life like without lungs, I suggest you talk quickly." Shadow said, showing his free hand and it was flowing with dark energy.

"Ok! Ok! Our operations are nearby in an warehouse, near an alley! You can find the other two demons or whatever the hell you guys are!" The thug said.

"Anything else you can tell me?"

"They are planning to reshape the world or something, saying that the earth will be different when we take over!"

"Thanks." Shadow said, then punching the thug in the head, knocking him out, and tossing him along with the other thug. "Ok, now I know where to find those two. But they want to change the world forever. Not good. I need to alert Kate. We can't allow the earth's appearance to change...our main goal right now is to take down the last of deamons and to prevent that full on change of merging..."

Shadow quickly tied up the gangsters, waiting until night to sit them out on a corner where two cops would pick them up. 'Kate needs to get back here, rather quickly, if we are to win this battle, I need her here. As for Jasmine and Jak, they deserve to have a normal life as kids. But we need to find a way to prevent this running back and forth.'
1111111111212212111122122112121111111121.title: The World, Reshaped?

info.brief_description: One year after the dream, things are really on the line as the real world is in danger.
info.description:
Story will be explained in first chapter.

------------------------------Heroes-----------------------------------------
Jak is the main character of the The Goddess and The Dreamer series. He is 15 years old. He is a guy who takes life calmly, and tries to be optimstic about everything. Jak has been worried about what is going to happen since the dream he had a year ago.

Jasmine is another main character. She is 16 years old. She is Jak's girlfriend. She is a little curious at times, and she's always been kind to others, but can be a little too excited at times. Jasmine is also worried about what is to come. She didn't dream the adventure, but since Jak had dreamed it, she knows about the dream and told Jak this the day after he had the dream.

Shadow is a main character. He is a Deamon. He used to work for Nostory. He helped Jak and Jasmine to go againest Nostory. Before Jak and Jasmine went back to the real world. He told them that they would meet again. Age is Unknown but seems to be in his mid 20's

Kate Berlin is a main character. She works for LOR, a rebel group who is determined to stop the Deamon race and put their plans to rest. She met up with Shadow, Jak, and Jamsine and joined them to stop Nostory. She isn't a part of the real world, but also would meet Jak and Jasmine they would meet again.

-------------------------------------Villians-------------------------------Nostory is the Deamon who commands all of the Deamon Horde. He was trying to take over the other world, but now that he has entry to the real world, he is going to try to take over it.

Seth is Nostory's powerful Ally. He sided with Nostory years ago. And he hates Shadow very very much. He killed an old friend that made Seth want to kill Shadow. Her name was Lylthe.

Deamons are beings of darkness, who all have traits of beast, like claws or talons.
--------------------------------Rules---------------------------------------
Jak can't die in the main story. ...Unless you choose to have your own story, he can die.
Minimal Sexual Content: You can have Jasmine play with Jak a little.
Use correct spelling. I will take any close spellings.
Jak can shrink too.

Have Fun. And Enjoy!
